Sally Sadie Singhateh (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Gambia na-ede uri na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ.

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Foundation for Research on Women's Health, Productivity and the Environment (BAFROW), o bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu na The Voice of Young People Magazine, nke BAFROW bipụtara ma lekwasị anya na ndị ntorobịa
N'afọ 1995, ọ meriri Merit's International Poetry Award.
Singhateh nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Communication ma na-enweta Master of Arts na Contemporary Literature na 2004 na Mahadum Wales, Swansea
Na BAFROW, otu nzukọ na-eme mkpọsa megide ibi ụmụ nwaanyị ùgwù na Gambia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'afọ 2008
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs Gambia nke UNESCO, nakwa na mmekọrịta ọha na eze, site na 2009.
